name: Alomomola
description: They float upon the open sea. Many water Pokémon gather in the area around Alomomola.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.effect: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any major status ailment after each turn.
abilities.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.effect: This Pokémon regains 1/3 of its maximum HP when it is switched out for another Pokémon under any circumstances other than having fainted.  This ability does not take effect when a battle ends.
abilities.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
